@graph.alternateName: Remove Powered by Shopify Footer Text

@graph.name: How to Remove 'Powered by Shopify' from Footer
@graph.description: Step-by-step instructions for removing Shopify branding from your store footer using two different methods.

step.name: Method 1: Edit Theme Code
step.text: Log in to Shopify Admin, go to Online Store > Themes, click Actions > Edit Code, open footer.liquid in Sections folder, search for 'Powered by Shopify' and delete the line, then save changes.

step.name: Method 2: Edit Languages
step.text: Access Shopify Admin, navigate to Online Store > Themes, click Actions > Edit languages, search for 'powered' in translations, delete the default content, and save changes.

step.name: Customize Footer Space
step.text: Add custom brand messages, call-to-action buttons, important links, or brand taglines to utilize the newly available footer space effectively.

mainEntity.name: Can I remove the 'Powered by Shopify' text from any Shopify theme?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, these methods work for all Shopify themes, including both free and paid themes. However, for some third-party themes, you may need to consult the theme developer.

mainEntity.name: Is it legal to remove the 'Powered by Shopify' text?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Shopify allows you to remove this text. It's part of their platform's customization options.

mainEntity.name: Will this affect my store's performance?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, removing the footer text won't affect how your store functions. It's a purely cosmetic change.

mainEntity.name: What should I do if the text still appears after removal?

acceptedAnswer.text: Clear your browser cache, check for theme-specific code in other files, and review third-party apps that might affect the footer.
